alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Litchfield, northeastern Ulster, Dutchess, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Greene Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1026 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodstock to near Lake Carmel. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, New Milford, Kingston, Hudson, Catskill, Saugerties, Rhinebeck, Pawling, Hyde Park, Pleasant Valley, Hurley, Woodstock, Amenia, Livingston, Kent, Highland, Pine Plains, Clermont, Red Hook and Athens. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 19 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
